channel.title: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?
channel.description: My account is muted, But i appealed them all, is there another way to message jagex and get it back?

item.title: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?
item.dc:creator: @Yoshi0308 Yoshi0308
item.description:
@Yoshi0308 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:6, topic:148782”][quote author=C0rn L33 link=topic=204017.msg1805646#msg1805646 date=1191705481]
i know a way to get accounts back. Say your guna hang your self if they do not un ban ur account. It really works thats how got my lvl 89 back lol.
[/quote]

no it doesnt they just send you to some suicide site.[/quote]Lol really? Do you know the link?

Read full topic
item.source: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?

item.title: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:3, topic:148782”]No, they clearly state in the last chance appeal that if you send them queries regarding the ban/mute etc. they will ignore them.[/quote]That’s a lie , they ignore them if you messaged the saying your were going to give them gold.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?

item.title: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

No, they clearly state in the last chance appeal that if you send them queries regarding the ban/mute etc. they will ignore them.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you get a acc back after all have been appealed?

item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Couldn’t you send them a message, not via the black marks page asking for another apeal, or sned them your apeal through that.

Read full topic
